LanguageData.OE_Slime_Ancient.label: ancient slime
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Ancient.description: Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.\n\nAncient slime - an unconfigured without purpose, perhaps when butchery it, you will be able to find out secrets of Slimes creation.
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Ancient.tools.mouth.label: mouth
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Ancient.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Waste.label: waste slime
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Waste.description: Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.\n\nWaste slime special type, that has developed for eating Toxic wastepacks.
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Waste.tools.mouth.label: mouth
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Waste.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Companion_Worker.label: worker companion slime
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Companion_Worker.description: Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.\n\nWorker companion slime special type, that has developed an ability to enhance working skills of anyone they bond with. Unfortunately, as a side effect, it the bonded master of the companion slime dies, the slime will also die.
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Companion_Battle.label: battle companion slime
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Companion_Battle.description: Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.\n\nBattle companion slime special type, that has developed an ability to enhance combat skills of anyone they bond with. Unfortunately, as a side effect, it the bonded master of the companion slime dies, the slime will also die.
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Companion_Anima.label: anima companion slime
LanguageData.OE_Slime_Companion_Anima.description: Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.\n\nAnima companion slime special type, that has developed an ability to enhance psychic powers of anyone they bond with. Unfortunately, as a side effect, it the bonded master of the companion slime dies, the slime will also die.
